description:
Welcome to Stakeholder Maps: Learn How to Identify and Manage Stakeholders!

The course covers the crucial aspect of managing stakeholders. From my experience as a Business Analyst and with managing Business Analysts, I realized that stakeholder management was often forgotten. This oversight alone was causing projects to fail.

Come learn everything you need to know around managing stakeholders to increase your project success rate. You learn about identifying, categorizing, mapping, and assigning stakeholder responsibilities.

As all successful Business Analysts understand, the search for knowledge and techniques will never end. I look forward to giving you the knowledge and know-how to enable you to complete Stakeholder Management on all of your future projects and increase your project success rate!


What bonuses are included in this course?

This course includes a Stakeholder Map template! This template will allow you to be effective and efficient in creating Stakeholder Maps within your projects.

This course also includes a RACI Matrix template FREE! This template will enable to you accurately assign and document stakeholder responsibilities for your projects.


Why should you enroll?

You should enroll if you want to quickly learn the building blocks in identifying, categorizing, mapping, and assigning responsibilities to stakeholders. Stakeholder management is a crucial step for all projects and is many times overlooked. Don't allow your projects suffer due to mismanaged stakeholders.

As always, Jeremy, the instructor, is always available to help out - as if you were in a live course. So if you ever need something explained further, you will find an answer.

Get ready to put another skill specific tool in your toolbox!
title: Learn to Identify and Manage Stakeholders: Business Analyst
